name: part_015
file: tmp_《BIRDS NIGHT OUT》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2024 #ReineMeptember2024 [DNDhaDTXta4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine introduces her 3D Birthday Live 2024 merchandise, including a T-shirt, tote bag, keychain, and voice pack.
Reine announces her new song 'YUMMY YUM YUMMY' and prepares for the final performance of the live.
Reine performs her new song 'YUMMY YUM YUMMY'.

subtitles.original: Look at that oversized T-shirt! Loose-fit T-shirt,
subtitles.english: Look at that oversized T-shirt! Loose-fit T-shirt,

subtitles.original: Terbangnya Sang Putri Neon.
subtitles.english: Flight of the Neon Princess.

subtitles.original: Anjay, keren banget nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Man, this is so cool, right?

subtitles.original: This is a big silhouette T-shirt that can be worn by everybody.
subtitles.english: This is a big silhouette T-shirt that can be worn by everybody.

subtitles.original: Kita bisa lihat nggak sih? Can we see?
subtitles.english: Can we see? Can we see?

subtitles.original: Can we see the zoom-out version of the shirt?
subtitles.english: Can we see the zoom-out version of the shirt?

subtitles.original: Oh nggak, yang ini udah. Ya udah.
subtitles.english: Oh, it's this one already? Okay, never mind then.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu nggak apa-apa.
subtitles.english: If that's the case, then that's fine.

subtitles.original: And please don't forget to wear it to events, okay?
subtitles.english: And please don't forget to wear it to events, okay?

subtitles.original: Pokoknya keren banget. Nanti kalau misalnya... "Hmm, kamu fansnya siapa ya?"
subtitles.english: Anyway, it's really cool. So if someone asks, "Hmm, whose fan are you?"

subtitles.original: Terus kayak... Sroot! Jreng! "Owalah fansnya Reine," gitu!
subtitles.english: Then you go... Sroot! Jreng! "Oh, I'm a Reine fan!" like that.

subtitles.original: You can show your oshi through your shirt.
subtitles.english: You can show your oshi through your shirt.

subtitles.original: Ya pokoknya keren sih menurut aku ya.
subtitles.english: Yeah, anyway, it's cool in my opinion.

subtitles.original: And then the next one, ada ini!
subtitles.english: And then the next one, we have this!

subtitles.original: Ooh, ada apa tuh? Ada tote bag!
subtitles.english: Ooh, what's that? A tote bag!

subtitles.original: It's a reversible tote bag pakai zipper. Menurut aku keren banget sih.
subtitles.english: It's a reversible tote bag with a zipper. I think it's really cool.

subtitles.original: It fits A4 size and is designed with a zipper for ease of use.
subtitles.english: It fits A4 size and is designed with a zipper for ease of use.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau misalnya kalian lagi ya, nonton konser lagi hype banget, kayak...
subtitles.english: So if you're at a concert and you're getting really hyped, like...

subtitles.original: Terus kayak kalian nggak perlu takut barang kalian tumpah semua gitu.
subtitles.english: Then you don't need to be afraid your things will all spill out.

subtitles.original: Kalau menurut aku sih keren banget. You don't need to be afraid...
subtitles.english: I think it's really cool. You don't need to be afraid...

subtitles.original: ...when you're like super hyped and finally your things fall all over the place...
subtitles.english: ...when you're like super hyped and finally your things fall all over the place...

subtitles.original: ...because you jump all over the place because you're too hyped.
subtitles.english: ...because you jump all over the place because you're too hyped.

subtitles.original: Yeah, so I think it's very, very perfect with the zipper, of course, gitu.
subtitles.english: Yeah, so I think it's very, very perfect with the zipper, of course.

subtitles.original: And you can also attach keychains in the tote bag so you can show off.
subtitles.english: And you can also attach keychains to the tote bag so you can show off.

subtitles.original: And what if you don't have any keychains? What do you do?
subtitles.english: And what if you don't have any keychains? What do you do?

subtitles.original: Next one we have this! This, this, this!
subtitles.english: Next one we have this! This, this, this!

subtitles.original: Aduh capek sendiri aku, heboh sendiri.
subtitles.english: Man, I'm getting tired being so hyped by myself.

subtitles.original: We have Mark of the Peafowl, Pavolia Reine seru banget cute keychain...
subtitles.english: We have Mark of the Peafowl, a very cool and cute keychain...

subtitles.original: ...featuring aurora fabric and metal charm.
subtitles.english: ...featuring holographic fabric and a metal charm.

subtitles.original: Ini bagus banget karena ada kain hologram dan logamnya gitu ya.
subtitles.english: It's really nice because of the holographic fabric and metal.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau misalnya kalian nggak punya atau punya pun nggak apa-apa, pokoknya harus gantungin ini biar pas.
subtitles.english: So even if you don't have it, or even if you do, you should hang this to match.

subtitles.original: You can hang it like "Shring!" gitu and show off your tote bag and show off your keychain with the shirt.
subtitles.english: You can hang it like "Shring!" and show off your tote bag, keychain, and shirt.

subtitles.original: Gitu kalau menurut aku sih perfect banget. And then...
subtitles.english: I think that's just perfect. And then...

subtitles.original: That's not all. There is one more thing. This is the next one!
subtitles.english: That's not all! There is one more thing. Next is the next one!

subtitles.original: A birthday situational voice pack! Yay!
subtitles.english: A birthday situational voice pack! Yay!

subtitles.original: Keren banget nggak sih? Pokoknya isinya apa? Apa ya? Rahasia deh.
subtitles.english: Isn't it so cool? Anyway, what's in it? Well, it's a secret.

subtitles.original: Pokoknya it's a secret. You have to listen to know what it's about.
subtitles.english: It's a secret, so you have to listen to find out what it's about.

subtitles.original: But it will have something to do with this whole performance. Pokoknya keren aja sih menurut aku.
subtitles.english: But it will have something to do with this whole performance. I think it's just really cool.

subtitles.original: Ya gitu pokoknya keren deh pokoknya.
subtitles.english: Anyway, it's cool!

subtitles.original: I will zloop! Pokoknya you have to listen. You have to listen.
subtitles.english: I will go "zloop"! You definitely have to listen. You have to listen.

subtitles.original: You have to listen to find out and tell me what you guys think, okay?
subtitles.english: Listen to find out and tell me what you think, okay?

subtitles.original: And by the way, this voice pack will be sold separately, not as part of the merchandise set.
subtitles.english: By the way, this voice pack will be sold separately, not as part of the merch set.

subtitles.original: So please do keep that in mind, okay?
subtitles.english: So please keep that in mind, okay?

subtitles.original: And also, here's a special bonus you get for buying the goods set.
subtitles.english: Also, here's a special bonus for buying the goods set.

subtitles.original: Bonus spesial ya buat yang beli yang komplit.
subtitles.english: Special bonus for those who buy the complete set.

subtitles.original: Ada hand-signed polaroid cheki-style bromide cards. Bromide bergaya polaroid bertanda tangan.
subtitles.english: There's a hand-signed polaroid cheki-style bromide card.

subtitles.original: Pokoknya everybody will get the card but there's a limited quantity.
subtitles.english: Everybody gets a card, but there's a limited quantity.

subtitles.original: Jadi ya pokoknya cepet-cepetan aja guys.
subtitles.english: So first come, first served, guys!

subtitles.original: And if you buy the full set, you will receive a card...
subtitles.english: And if you buy the full set, you will receive a card...

subtitles.original: ...that can be used in the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME as a special bonus.
subtitles.english: ...that can be used in the hololive OFFICIAL CARD GAME as a special bonus.

subtitles.original: Pokoknya bisa deh tapi apa namanya... cuma dari ini ya, hololive Official Store gitu, shop.
subtitles.english: But it's only available from the hololive Official Store.

subtitles.original: Jadi it's a key hololive member card to show off your favorite, namanya oshi holomem card.
subtitles.english: It's an "Oshi Holomem Card" to show off your favorite member.

subtitles.original: Dan cuma ada di Jepang, bahasa Jepang. Oke?
subtitles.english: It's only available in Japan and in Japanese. Okay?

subtitles.original: Jadi tapi bisanya belinya dari official shop aja ya guys. So keep that in mind.
subtitles.english: But you can buy it from the official shop, so keep that in mind.

subtitles.original: hololive official shop only, gitu. And then...
subtitles.english: hololive official shop only. And then...

subtitles.original: Second announcement! Kita ngebut banget nih guys announcement-nya.
subtitles.english: Second announcement! We're rushing through these announcements, guys.

subtitles.original: Ayo! Ayo second announcement sekarang sekarang sekarang!
subtitles.english: Come on! Come on, second announcement! Right now, right now, right now!

subtitles.original: Aku punya lagu baru! Aku punya lagu baru! Pokoknya kalian harus mendengarkan.
subtitles.english: I have a new song! I have a new song! You definitely have to listen to it.

subtitles.original: Judulnya adalah YUMMY YUM YUMMY.
subtitles.english: The title is "YUMMY YUM YUMMY."

subtitles.original: Gitu. Jadi lyrics and composition-nya done by Hylen-san.
subtitles.english: The lyrics and composition are by Hylen-san.

subtitles.original: Pokoknya menurut aku sih keren banget ya. Dan kayaknya tuh feels-nya it's crafted with a dark yet pop feel.
subtitles.english: I think it's really cool. It was crafted with a "dark yet pop" feel.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau menurut aku sih kayak mature but also pop gitu. Jadi it's a nice mix of both worlds.
subtitles.english: It's mature yet pop at the same time—a nice mix of both worlds.

subtitles.original: It will be released on September 10, 00:00. So please be sure to listen to it.
subtitles.english: It will be released on September 10, 00:00, so please listen to it.

subtitles.original: There might be timezone differences and stuff like that, but yeah please do keep your eyes peeled, okay?
subtitles.english: There might be timezone differences, but keep your eyes peeled!

subtitles.original: And of course this time we will be ending the live concert with this song, okay?
subtitles.english: And of course, we'll be ending this live concert with this song!

subtitles.original: So guys, please enjoy, okay? YUMMY YUM YUMMY!
subtitles.english: So guys, please enjoy "YUMMY YUM YUMMY!"

subtitles.original: Kiite kudasai! Ganti baju dulu! Hehe.
subtitles.english: Please listen! I'll go change my clothes first! Hehe.
